531471-d-08-22-06-WC.Narrative: WSOR'S TRAIN - JH-22, WAS TRAVELING AT 10 MPH IT DERAILED 2 LOCOMOTIVES AND 9 EMPTY CARS.  LOCOMOTIVE UNIT WSOR 4004 RUPTURED ITS FUEL TANK SPILLING ALL OF ITS CONTENTS.  A DERAILED LOCOMOTIVE SIDESWIPED CAR - SOO 115353 STANDING ON THE WC'S SIDING.  FURTHER INVESTIGATION INTO THE DERAILMENT FOUND THAT THE INITIAL POINT OF THE DERAILMENT WAS ON WSOR PROPERTY IN A 10 DEGREE CURVE NEAR A CROSSING THAT WAS RECENTLY REBUILT.  THE TRANSITION RAIL WAS A RELAY PIECE OF RAIL INSTALLED UP TO A NEW PIECEOF RAIL.  CONTRIBUTING FACTORS ARE MISMATCH RAIL AND TIGHT GAUGE IN A 10 DEGREE CURVE.  THE DERAILMENT STARTED ON THE WSOR AND WAS DRAGGED ONTO WC PROPERTY.  THERE WAS AN EVACUATION DUE TO HOMES BEINGAT RISK BY SUSPENDED RAIL UNDER TENSION THAT COULD HAVE STRUCK THE HOMES IF RELEASED.
